p: Plant collection and identification: Leaves of M. mozaffarianii were collected in March 2014 from the Genow protected area, Bandar Abbas, Hormozgan Province, south of Iran. The leaves were identified by R. Asadpour. A voucher specimen was deposited at the Herbarium of the Department of Pharmacognosy, Pharmaceutical Sciences Branch, Islamic Azad University, Tehran, Iran (code #1011-AUPF).
